name: Starmender
description:
A match 3 game with a cutesy space theme created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2020! Gather 100 starbits and fix a broken star as quick as you can. Play again to beat your fastest time!

Programmer: Permagate

2D Artist: Ohfivethirty

In addition, we also used extra assets to accompany the game:

Pixel Square Font is created by kenney.nl

"Solve the Puzzle" and "Interstellar Odyssey" background musics are created by Patrick de Arteaga (patrickdearteaga.com)

Sound effects are created by NoiseForFun (noiseforfun.com).
